advancement.deep_aether.brass_dungeon.de:
Defeat the brass boss
§b- Deep Aether -
advancement.deep_aether.transform_poison:
Transform an item by throwing it into Poison
§b- Deep Aether -
advancements.deep_aether.aether_champion:
Defeat all Aether bosses without taking a single hit
§b- Deep Aether -
Explore all Aether biomes
§b- Deep Aether -
advancements.deep_aether.stratus_armor.d:
Get a full set of Stratus Armor
§b- Deep Aether -
aether.pro_tips.line.deep_aether.deep_ae: §bTips from Deep Aether are light blue!
aether.pro_tips.line.deep_aether.poison: §bPoison can be used to un-enchant blocks and items from an Altar.
aether.pro_tips.line.deep_aether.poison_: §bSquashes become purple when thrown in Poison.
aether.pro_tips.line.deep_aether.squashe: §bHave you ever tried enchanting Pumpkin Seeds in an Altar?
aether.pro_tips.line.deep_aether.sterlin: §bSterling Aerclouds can rarely be found near the build limit.
deep_aether.brass_treasure_chest_locked: This Treasure Chest must be unlocked with a Brass Key.
deep_aether.locate.fail: Bound structure could not be located nearby
deep_aether.structure.failed: %s can not be located within a %s block radius. Please explore further and try again later
deep_aether.structure.failed.tooltip: %s can not be located, perhaps try again later
deep_aether.structure.found: %s has been located %s blocks away, compass is pointing towards the structure
deep_aether.structure.found.tooltip: %s has been located, compass is pointing towards the structure
deep_aether.structure.unset.tooltip: No structure has been set, shift right-click to select a structure
deep_aether.structure.wrong_dimension.to: You are not in the dimension in which %s was found
effect.deep_aether.moa_bonus_jumps.descr: Temporarily increases the number of jumps a Moa has.
enchantment.deep_aether.gloves_reach.des: Increases the block placement reach when equipped on a glove.
gui.deep_aether.eots.message.interact: What a wind. Maybe I should try to hit that?
gui.deep_aether.eots.title: the Eye of the Storm
gui.deep_aether.slider_ring:
Increases your speed when your health is low
Current Increase:
item.deep_aether.smithing_template.strat: Add gravitite armor, weapon, or tool
item.deep_aether.smithing_template.storm: Add Skyjade armor, weapon, or tool
jukebox_song.deep_aether.a_morning_wish: Emile van Krieken - A Morning Wish
lore.block.deep_aether.aerglow_blossom_b: Crafted from Aerglow Blossoms. Can be used for decoration or as a light source.
lore.block.deep_aether.aerglow_grass_blo: This is a variant of the typical Aether Grass Block, but it's more of a blue-ish color.
lore.block.deep_aether.aerglow_grass_pat: This block is the result of using a shovel on an Aerglow Grass Block.
lore.block.deep_aether.aerlavender: These beautiful flowers can be found in large numbers in Aerlavender Fields. They can be crafted into pink dye when placed into a Crafting Table.
lore.block.deep_aether.aersmog: This venomous block has similar properties to Aerclouds, and is the product of Water and Poison mixing together.
lore.block.deep_aether.aerwhale_totem: A carved skyroot log which closely resembles an Aerwhale.
lore.block.deep_aether.aether_cattails: A cyan flower found in Yagroot Swamps. Can be potted and used for decoration or to craft Cyan dye.
lore.block.deep_aether.aether_coarse_dir: A pale variant of coarse dirt. It cannot grow into grass, but can be tilled back into Aether Dirt.
lore.block.deep_aether.aether_moss_carpe: Aether's variant of a moss carpet
lore.block.deep_aether.aether_mud: This block spawns primarily in the Yagroot Forest, but can also be obtained by combining Aether Dirt and a Water Bottle in a crafting table.
lore.block.deep_aether.aether_mud_bricks: Crafted from Packed Aether Mud. Can be used for decoration.
Crafted from Aether Mud Bricks. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Aether Mud Bricks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
Crafted from Aether Mud Bricks. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.deep_aether.aseterite: One of Aether's native rock types. Can be found in large chunks in the Aether. Can be used for decoration or to craft Polished Aseterite.
lore.block.deep_aether.aseterite_bricks: Used as a building material native to the Aether. It is made from Aseterite, and is used mainly for decoration.
lore.block.deep_aether.aseterite_bricks_: Crafted from Aseterite Bricks. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Aseterite Bricks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
Crafted from Aseterite Bricks. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.deep_aether.aseterite_slab: Crafted from Aseterite. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
lore.block.deep_aether.aseterite_stairs: Crafted from Aseterite. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.deep_aether.aseterite_wall: Crafted from Aseterite. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.deep_aether.big_holystone_bri: Used as an alternative to Holystone Bricks. It is made from Holystone, and mimics the look of many common brick types.
Crafted from Big Holystone Bricks. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Big Holystone Bricks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
Crafted from Big Holystone Bricks. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.deep_aether.blightmoss_holyst: Crafted from Blightmoss Holystone Bricks. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Blightmoss Holystone Bricks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
Crafted from Blightmoss Holystone Bricks. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
A blighted variant of Holystone Bricks. Can be used for decoration.
Crafted from Blightmoss Holystone Tiles. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Blightmoss Holystone Tiles. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
Crafted from Blightmoss Holystone Tiles. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
A blighted variant of Holystone Tiles. Can be used for decoration.
lore.block.deep_aether.blue_roseroot_lea: These leaves generate with Blue Roseroot Trees. They can drop Blue Roseroot Saplings when decaying.
lore.block.deep_aether.blue_roseroot_sap: These small blue saplings will grow into Roseroot Trees. They can be grown faster with Bone Meal.
lore.block.deep_aether.blue_squash: One of two squash variants that can be grown from Squash Seeds. Can craft Blue Squash Slices.
lore.block.deep_aether.chiseled_holyston: Crafted from Holystone. It is used for decoration.
lore.block.deep_aether.chromatic_aerclou: The result of enchanting a Sterling Aercloud in an Altar. Is used to create a Stratus ingot.
lore.block.deep_aether.clorite: Can be used for decoration or to craft Polished Clorite.
lore.block.deep_aether.clorite_pillar: This is Clorite in pillar form, and can be crafted in a 2 x 3 formation like a door to create it.
lore.block.deep_aether.clorite_slab: Crafted from Clorite. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
lore.block.deep_aether.clorite_stairs: Crafted from Clorite. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.deep_aether.clorite_wall: Crafted from Clorite. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.deep_aether.cloudbloom_carpet: Quite the chic carpet that isn't made from wool. Use this to spice up your cozy home.
lore.block.deep_aether.cobbled_aseterite: A crushed variant of Aseterite. Can be used to craft decorations.
Crafted from Cobbled Aseterite. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Cobbled Aseterite. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
Crafted from Cobbled Aseterite. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.deep_aether.combiner: Used to create an assortment of items by combining Golden Amber, Frozen Goldenleaf Berries, and a third item of choice. Can be found in Brass Dungeons, or made for yourself!
lore.block.deep_aether.conberry_button: Crafted from Conberry Planks, a button used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
lore.block.deep_aether.conberry_door: Crafted from Conberry Planks, an ornate door helpful for keeping an enclosed and safe space without worry of monsters wandering in.
lore.block.deep_aether.conberry_fence: Crafted from Conberry planks and Skyroot Sticks. Great for keeping your livestock safe from wandering predators!
lore.block.deep_aether.conberry_fence_ga: Crafted from Skyroot Sticks and Conberry planks. Gives a homely entrance and exit to your precious enclosures.
lore.block.deep_aether.conberry_hanging_: A helpful hanging sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.
lore.block.deep_aether.conberry_leaves: These leaves generate with Conberry Trees. They can drop Conberry Saplings when decaying.
lore.block.deep_aether.conberry_log: These spawn with Conberry Trees. They can be double dropped with Skyroot Axes. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Conberry Planks.
lore.block.deep_aether.conberry_log_wall: Crafted from Conberry. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.deep_aether.conberry_planks: Conberry Planks can be made into various tools, blocks and items. They are crafted from Conberry Logs, and make a great building material.
lore.block.deep_aether.conberry_pressure: Crafted from Conberry Planks. A wooden pressure plate used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
lore.block.deep_aether.conberry_sapling: These small golden saplings will grow into Conberry Trees. They can be grown faster with Bone Meal.
lore.block.deep_aether.conberry_sign: Crafted from Conberry Planks and Skyroot Sticks. A helpful sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.
lore.block.deep_aether.conberry_slab: Crafted from Conberry. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
lore.block.deep_aether.conberry_stairs: Crafted from Conberry Planks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.deep_aether.conberry_trapdoor: Crafted from Conberry Planks. A Trapdoor useful for covering entryways one block wide. Often used to add extra protection to staircases.
lore.block.deep_aether.conberry_wall: Crafted from Conberry. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.deep_aether.conberry_wood: When putting Conberry Wood in a crafting table they will provide 4 Cruderoot Planks. Crafted to be smooth on all sides.
lore.block.deep_aether.cruderoot_button: Crafted from Cruderoot Planks, a button used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
lore.block.deep_aether.cruderoot_door: Crafted from Cruderoot Planks, an ornate door helpful for keeping an enclosed and safe space without worry of monsters wandering in.
lore.block.deep_aether.cruderoot_fence: Crafted from Cruderoot planks and Skyroot Sticks. Great for keeping your livestock safe from wandering predators!
lore.block.deep_aether.cruderoot_fence_g: Crafted from Skyroot Sticks and Cruderoot planks. Gives a homely entrance and exit to your precious enclosures.
lore.block.deep_aether.cruderoot_hanging: A helpful hanging sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.
lore.block.deep_aether.cruderoot_leaves: These leaves generate with Cruderoot Trees. They can drop Cruderoot Saplings when decaying.
lore.block.deep_aether.cruderoot_log: These spawn with Cruderoot Trees. They can be double dropped with Skyroot Axes. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Cruderoot Planks.
lore.block.deep_aether.cruderoot_log_wal: Crafted from Cruderoot. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.deep_aether.cruderoot_planks: Cruderoot Planks can be made into various tools, blocks and items. They are crafted from Cruderoot Logs, and make a great building material.
lore.block.deep_aether.cruderoot_pressur: Crafted from Cruderoot Planks. A wooden pressure plate used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
lore.block.deep_aether.cruderoot_sapling: These small pink saplings will grow into Cruderoot Trees. They can be grown faster with Bone Meal.
lore.block.deep_aether.cruderoot_sign: Crafted from Cruderoot Planks and Skyroot Sticks. A helpful sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.
lore.block.deep_aether.cruderoot_slab: Crafted from Cruderoot. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
lore.block.deep_aether.cruderoot_stairs: Crafted from Cruderoot Planks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.deep_aether.cruderoot_trapdoo: Crafted from Cruderoot Planks. A Trapdoor useful for covering entryways one block wide. Often used to add extra protection to staircases.
lore.block.deep_aether.cruderoot_wall: Crafted from Cruderoot. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.deep_aether.cruderoot_wood: When putting Cruderoot Wood in a crafting table they will provide 4 Cruderoot Planks. Crafted to be smooth on all sides.
lore.block.deep_aether.echaisy: One of many Aether flowers. It is said to have good effects when eaten.
lore.block.deep_aether.enchanted_blossom: This flower spawns in the Golden Heights biome. It can be crafted into White Dye.
lore.block.deep_aether.feather_grass: Feather Grass is a variant of Aether Grass. This is the normal variant.
lore.block.deep_aether.flowering_blue_ro: These leaves generate with Blue Roseroot Trees. They can drop Aerglow Blossoms when decaying. They also emit light.
lore.block.deep_aether.flowering_roseroo: These leaves generate with Roseroot Trees. They can drop Aerglow Blossoms when decaying. They also emit light.
lore.block.deep_aether.frosted_holystone: Crafted from Frosted Holystone Bricks. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Frosted Holystone Bricks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
Crafted from Frosted Holystone Bricks. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
A frosted variant of Holystone Bricks. Can be used for decoration.
Crafted from Frosted Holystone Tiles. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Frosted Holystone Tiles. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
Crafted from Frosted Holystone Tiles. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
A frosted variant of Holystone Tiles. Can be used for decoration.
lore.block.deep_aether.gilded_holystone_: Crafted from Gilded Holystone Bricks. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Gilded Holystone Bricks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
Crafted from Gilded Holystone Bricks. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
A gilded variant of Holystone Bricks. Can be used for decoration.
Crafted from Gilded Holystone Tiles. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Gilded Holystone Tiles. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
Crafted from Gilded Holystone Tiles. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
A gilded variant of Holystone Tiles. Can be used for decoration.
lore.block.deep_aether.glowing_spores: A spore that glows in the dark. It can both be applied to other plants, such as tall grass and vines or be planted on the ground. Found under large masses of cloud.
lore.block.deep_aether.golden_aspess: One of many Aether flowers. It is said to have good effects when eaten.
lore.block.deep_aether.golden_flower: This flower spawns in the Golden Heights biome. It can be crafted into Orange Dye.
lore.block.deep_aether.golden_heights_di: This is the path block variant of Golden Grass.
lore.block.deep_aether.golden_heights_gr: Golden Grass is a variant of Aether Grass that spawns in the Golden Heights biome.
lore.block.deep_aether.green_squash: One of two squash variants that can be grown from Squash Seeds. Can craft Green Squash Slices.
lore.block.deep_aether.holystone_pillar: A pillar variant of Holystone. Can be found primarily in Brass Dungeons, and is very good for decoration.
lore.block.deep_aether.holystone_pillar_: The bottom segment of a Holystone Pillar; they look excellent and are great for building.
The top segment of a Holystone Pillar; they look excellent and are great for building.
lore.block.deep_aether.holystone_tile_sl: Crafted from Holystone Tiles. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
lore.block.deep_aether.holystone_tile_st: Crafted from Holystone Tiles. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.deep_aether.holystone_tile_wa: Crafted from Holystone Tiles. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.deep_aether.holystone_tiles: A tile variant of Holystone. Can be used for decoration.
lore.block.deep_aether.iaspove: One of many Aether flowers. It is said to have good effects when eaten.
lore.block.deep_aether.light_nimbus_pill: The light version of Nimbus Pillars, also found in Brass Dungeons.
lore.block.deep_aether.light_nimbus_ston: The light version of Nimbus Stone, also found in Brass Dungeons.
lore.block.deep_aether.lightcap_mushroom: A block part of a Huge Lightcap Mushroom Tree.
A type of Aether mushrooms that grow in the Aerglow Forest. Maybe they can be useful?
lore.block.deep_aether.medium_golden_gra: Golden Grass is a variant of Aether Grass that spawns in the Golden Heights biome. This is the medium variant.
lore.block.deep_aether.mini_golden_grass: Golden Grass is a variant of Aether Grass that spawns in the Golden Heights biome. This is the mini variant.
lore.block.deep_aether.moa_totem: A carved skyroot log which closely resembles a Moa.
lore.block.deep_aether.mossy_holystone_b: Crafted from Mossy Holystone Bricks. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Mossy Holystone Bricks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
Crafted from Mossy Holystone Bricks. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
A mossy variant of Holystone Bricks. Can be used for decoration.
lore.block.deep_aether.mossy_holystone_t: Crafted from Mossy Holystone Tiles. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Mossy Holystone Tiles. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
Crafted from Mossy Holystone Tiles. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
A mossy variant of Holystone Tiles. Can be used for decoration.
lore.block.deep_aether.muddy_yagroot_roo: A muddy variant of Yagroot Roots. Can be used for decorations.
lore.block.deep_aether.nimbus_pillar: One of the unique stones of the Brass Dungeon. This pillar can be mined and used as a decorative block.
lore.block.deep_aether.nimbus_slab: Crafted from Nimbus Stone. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
lore.block.deep_aether.nimbus_stairs: Crafted from Nimbus Stone. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.deep_aether.nimbus_stone: One of the unique stones of the Brass Dungeon. This stone can be mined and used as a decorative block.
lore.block.deep_aether.nimbus_wall: Crafted from Nimbus Stone. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.deep_aether.packed_aether_mud: A dryer and more solidified version of Aether Mud. You can create this packed version by combining it with an Aerglow Blossom in the crafting table.
lore.block.deep_aether.polished_aseterit: Used as a building material native to the Aether. It is made from Aseterite.
Crafted from Polished Aseterite. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Polished Aseterite. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.deep_aether.polished_clorite: Used as a building material native to the Aether. It is made from Clorite.
lore.block.deep_aether.polished_clorite_: Crafted from Polished Clorite. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Polished Clorite. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.deep_aether.purple_squash: Obtained by transforming a Blue or Green Squash in poison. Can craft Purple Squash Slices.
lore.block.deep_aether.radiant_orchid: These strong glowing flowers can be found in large numbers in Roseroot Forests. They can be crafted into white dye when placed into a Crafting Table.
lore.block.deep_aether.raw_clorite: One of Aether's native rock types. Can be found in large chunks in the Aether. Can be used for decoration or enchanted into Clorite.
lore.block.deep_aether.raw_clorite_slab: Crafted from Raw Clorite. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
lore.block.deep_aether.raw_clorite_stair: Crafted from Raw Clorite. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.deep_aether.raw_clorite_wall: Crafted from Raw Clorite. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.deep_aether.roseroot_button: Crafted from Roseroot Planks, a button used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
lore.block.deep_aether.roseroot_door: Crafted from Roseroot Planks, an ornate door helpful for keeping an enclosed and safe space without worry of monsters wandering in.
lore.block.deep_aether.roseroot_fence: Crafted from Roseroot planks and Skyroot Sticks. Great for keeping your livestock safe from wandering predators!
lore.block.deep_aether.roseroot_fence_ga: Crafted from Skyroot Sticks and Roseroot planks. Gives a homely entrance and exit to your precious enclosures.
lore.block.deep_aether.roseroot_hanging_: A helpful hanging sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.
lore.block.deep_aether.roseroot_leaves: These leaves generate with Roseroot Trees. They can drop Roseroot Saplings when decaying.
lore.block.deep_aether.roseroot_log: These spawn with Roseroot Trees. They can be double dropped with Skyroot Axes. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Roseroot Planks.
lore.block.deep_aether.roseroot_planks: Roseroot Planks can be made into various tools, blocks and items. They are crafted from Roseroot Logs, and make a great building material.
lore.block.deep_aether.roseroot_pressure: Crafted from Roseroot Planks. A wooden pressure plate used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
lore.block.deep_aether.roseroot_sapling: These small cyan saplings will grow into Roseroot Trees. They can be grown faster with Bone Meal.
lore.block.deep_aether.roseroot_sign: Crafted from Roseroot Planks and Skyroot Sticks. A helpful sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.
lore.block.deep_aether.roseroot_slab: Crafted from Roseroot. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
lore.block.deep_aether.roseroot_stairs: Crafted from Roseroot Planks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.deep_aether.roseroot_trapdoor: Crafted from Roseroot Planks. A Trapdoor useful for covering entryways one block wide. Often used to add extra protection to staircases.
lore.block.deep_aether.roseroot_wall: Crafted from Roseroot. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.deep_aether.roseroot_wood: When putting Roseroot Wood in a crafting table they will provide 4 Roseroot Planks. Crafted to be smooth on all sides.
lore.block.deep_aether.rotten_roseroot_l: A fallen and rotten Roseroot log found in forests, home to mushrooms. It can't be used for crafting, but might be a nice decorative option.
lore.block.deep_aether.short_golden_gras: Golden Grass is a variant of Aether Grass that spawns in the Golden Heights biome. This is the short variant.
lore.block.deep_aether.sky_tulips: One of many Aether flowers. It is said to have good effects when eaten.
lore.block.deep_aether.skyjade_block: A block of compacted Skyjade Gemstones. They can power beacons, and just have a sleek look to them.
lore.block.deep_aether.skyjade_lantern: A cozy lantern with materials native of the Aether. A stronger light source and more enjoyable than those old torches, so might as well use these.
lore.block.deep_aether.skyjade_ore: A rare ore that drops Skyjade Gemstones when broken with Iron-grade tools or better.
lore.block.deep_aether.skyjade_ring: Looks like chains can be made out of Skyjade Nuggets now! A nice addition for your builds, especially paired with its lantern!
lore.block.deep_aether.sterling_aercloud: This Aercloud is found way up high where it's hard to reach. When stepped on, lightning turns it into a Cold Aercloud. Can be enchanted in an altar to become a §cC§6h§er§ao§bm§9a§dt§ci§6c §eA§ae§br§9c§dl§co§6u§ed.
lore.block.deep_aether.stratus_block: Compressed stratus that is crafted from Stratus Ingots. Can be used for decoration.
lore.block.deep_aether.stratus_debris: One of Aether's most valuable resources. It can rarely be found inside of clouds in small patches.
lore.block.deep_aether.stripped_conberry: A Conberry Log that has had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Conberry Planks.
Crafted from Conberry. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
A Conberry Log that has had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Conberry Planks. Crafted to be smooth on all sides.
lore.block.deep_aether.stripped_cruderoo: A Cruderoot Log that has had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Cruderoot Planks.
Crafted from Cruderoot. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
A Cruderoot Log that has had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Cruderoot Planks. Crafted to be smooth on all sides.
lore.block.deep_aether.stripped_roseroot: A Roseroot Log that has had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Roseroot Planks.
Crafted from Roseroot. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
A Roseroot Wood that has had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Roseroot Planks. Crafted to be smooth on all sides.
lore.block.deep_aether.stripped_sunroot_: A Sunroot Log that has had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Sunroot Planks.
Crafted from Sunroot. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
A Sunroot Log that has had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Sunroot Planks. Crafted to be smooth on all sides.
lore.block.deep_aether.stripped_yagroot_: A Yagroot Log that has had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Yagroot Planks.
Crafted from Yagroot. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
A Yagroot Log that has had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Yagroot Planks. Crafted to be smooth on all sides.
lore.block.deep_aether.sunroot_button: Crafted from Sunroot Planks, a button used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
lore.block.deep_aether.sunroot_door: Crafted from Sunroot Planks, an ornate door helpful for keeping an enclosed and safe space without worry of monsters wandering in.
lore.block.deep_aether.sunroot_fence: Crafted from Sunroot planks and Skyroot Sticks. Great for keeping your livestock safe from wandering predators!
lore.block.deep_aether.sunroot_fence_gat: Crafted from Skyroot Sticks and Sunroot planks. Gives a homely entrance and exit to your precious enclosures.
lore.block.deep_aether.sunroot_hanging_s: A helpful hanging sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.
lore.block.deep_aether.sunroot_leaves: These leaves generate with Sunroot Trees. They can drop Sunroot Saplings when decaying.
lore.block.deep_aether.sunroot_log: These spawn with Sunroot Trees. They can be double dropped with Skyroot Axes. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Sunroot Planks.
lore.block.deep_aether.sunroot_planks: Sunroot Planks can be made into various tools, blocks and items. They are crafted from Sunroot Logs, and make a great building material.
lore.block.deep_aether.sunroot_pressure_: Crafted from Sunroot Planks. A wooden pressure plate used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
lore.block.deep_aether.sunroot_sapling: These small golden saplings will grow into Sunroot Trees. They can be grown faster with Bone Meal.
lore.block.deep_aether.sunroot_sign: Crafted from Sunroot Planks and Skyroot Sticks. A helpful sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.
lore.block.deep_aether.sunroot_slab: Crafted from Sunroot. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
lore.block.deep_aether.sunroot_stairs: Crafted from Sunroot Planks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.deep_aether.sunroot_trapdoor: Crafted from Sunroot Planks. A Trapdoor useful for covering entryways one block wide. Often used to add extra protection to staircases.
lore.block.deep_aether.sunroot_wall: Crafted from Sunroot. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.deep_aether.sunroot_wood: When putting Sunroot Wood in a crafting table they will provide 4 Cruderoot Planks. Crafted to be smooth on all sides.
lore.block.deep_aether.tall_aerlavender: A large variant of Aerlavender. These beautiful flowers can be found in large numbers in Aerlavender Fields. They can be crafted into pink dye when placed into a Crafting Table.
lore.block.deep_aether.tall_aether_catta: A cyan flower found in Yagroot Swamps. Can be potted and used for decoration or to craft Cyan dye.
lore.block.deep_aether.tall_feather_gras: Feather Grass is a variant of Aether Grass. This is the tall variant.
lore.block.deep_aether.tall_golden_grass: Golden Grass is a variant of Aether Grass that spawns in the Golden Heights biome. This is the tall variant.
lore.block.deep_aether.yagroot_button: Crafted from Yagroot Planks, a button used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
lore.block.deep_aether.yagroot_door: Crafted from Yagroot Planks, an ornate door helpful for keeping an enclosed and safe space without worry of monsters wandering in.
lore.block.deep_aether.yagroot_fence: Crafted from Yagroot planks and Skyroot Sticks. Great for keeping your livestock safe from wandering predators!
lore.block.deep_aether.yagroot_fence_gat: Crafted from Skyroot Sticks and Yagroot planks. Gives a homely entrance and exit to your precious enclosures.
lore.block.deep_aether.yagroot_hanging_s: A helpful hanging sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.
lore.block.deep_aether.yagroot_leaves: These leaves generate with Yagroot Trees. They can drop Yagroot Saplings when decaying.
lore.block.deep_aether.yagroot_log: These spawn with Yagroot Trees. They can be double dropped with Skyroot Axes. When put in a crafting table they will provide 4 Yagroot Planks.
lore.block.deep_aether.yagroot_planks: Yagroot Planks can be made into various tools, blocks and items. They are crafted from Yagroot Logs, and make a great building material.
lore.block.deep_aether.yagroot_pressure_: Crafted from Yagroot Planks. A wooden pressure plate used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
lore.block.deep_aether.yagroot_roots: These spawn with Yagroot Trees. They can be double dropped with Skyroot Axes. Can be used for decorations or to craft Muddy Yagroot Roots.
lore.block.deep_aether.yagroot_sapling: These small purple saplings will grow into Yagroot Trees. They can be grown faster with Bone Meal.
lore.block.deep_aether.yagroot_sign: Crafted from Yagroot Planks and Skyroot Sticks. A helpful sign perfect for writing messages and directions on.
lore.block.deep_aether.yagroot_slab: Crafted from Yagroot. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
lore.block.deep_aether.yagroot_stairs: Crafted from Yagroot Planks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.deep_aether.yagroot_trapdoor: Crafted from Yagroot Planks. A Trapdoor useful for covering entryways one block wide. Often used to add extra protection to staircases.
lore.block.deep_aether.yagroot_vine: These vines spawn with Yagroot trees and can be climbed on. Can be obtained with shears.
lore.block.deep_aether.yagroot_wall: Crafted from Yagroot. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!
lore.block.deep_aether.yagroot_wood: When putting Yagroot Wood in a crafting table they will provide 4 Roseroot Planks. Crafted to be smooth on all sides.
lore.block.deep_aether.zephyr_totem: A carved skyroot log which closely resembles a Zephyr.
lore.block.deep_aether.squall_block: A solid block made of Squall Plates. They can power beacons and be used as decorative accenting.
lore.item.deep_aether.aercloud_necklace: You can store clouds in your necklace now. When worn, it allows the wearer to stand on Aerclouds or Powdered Snow without falling through.
lore.item.deep_aether.aerglow_blossom: A crafting material obtained from Flowering Roseroot Leaves. Can be used to craft Aerglow Blossom Block.
lore.item.deep_aether.aerglow_fish_bucke: A bucket with an Aerglow Fish in it. Make sure to keep the water topped up or your new friend won't survive the journey home.
lore.item.deep_aether.aerwhale_saddle: A saddle big enough to fit on an aerwhale. This legendary item is dropped from the Aerwhale King from the addon Lost Aether Content. However if Lost Aether Content isn't installed it's crafted with a sun core and a saddle.
lore.item.deep_aether.aether_fish_spawn_: This is a spawn egg that is used to spawn the Aerglow Fish in Creative Mode.
lore.item.deep_aether.afterburner: Crafted from a Sun Core, it's a weapon that allows you to shoot fire to nearby enemies just like a flamethrower. It doesn't break, but its charges run out.
lore.item.deep_aether.antidote: A useful item that will provide 15 seconds of Remedy upon consumption. They can also enchant these in an altar for a longer lasting effect.
lore.item.deep_aether.baby_zephyr_spawn_: This is a spawn egg that is used to spawn the Baby Zephyr in Creative Mode.
lore.item.deep_aether.bio_crystal: Dropped from Venomites, these crystals can be used for creating antidotes and brewing stands!
lore.item.deep_aether.blade_of_luck: A mysterious weapon that deals a random amount of damage when hit fully charged. It can deal as low as one damage and up to a maximum of 20 damage! However be careful since this weapon has a long attack cooldown.
lore.item.deep_aether.blue_squash_slice: Obtained from Blue Squashes. Eating a slice can give mining fatigue, night vision, or speed.
lore.item.deep_aether.brass_dungeon_key: A colorful key that is dropped from the Eye of the Storm after being defeated. You can use it to claim the treasure you earned!
lore.item.deep_aether.cloud_cape: A soft cape that allows the wearer to double jump.
lore.item.deep_aether.cloudbloom_bouquet: A lovely bouquet for your loved ones and making carpets! Oh, wait...
lore.item.deep_aether.conberry_boat: While the Aether does not have many large bodies of water, a boat can occasionally be a useful tool for crossing large distances over ice!
lore.item.deep_aether.conberry_chest_boa: A Conberry Boat with a handy chest in the back. Helpful for transporting more items over long stretches of water, which are famously difficult to find in the Aether.
lore.item.deep_aether.cooked_aerglow_fis: Obtained after cooking Raw Aerglow Fish. Restores more hunger than the raw version too!
lore.item.deep_aether.cooked_quail: Can be obtained after cooking Raw Quail. Restores more hunger than the raw version too!
lore.item.deep_aether.cruderoot_boat: While the Aether does not have many large bodies of water, a boat can occasionally be a useful tool for crossing large distances over ice!
lore.item.deep_aether.cruderoot_chest_bo: A Cruderoot Boat with a handy chest in the back. Helpful for transporting more items over long stretches of water, which are famously difficult to find in the Aether.
lore.item.deep_aether.enchanted_antidote: An upgraded version of the typical Antidote. Remedy effects last twice as long after consumption.
lore.item.deep_aether.floaty_scarf: An offspring of the Eye of the Storm. This little companion can help you in fights and can even be colored!
lore.item.deep_aether.frozen_goldenleaf_: A variant of Goldenleaf Berries which is used for crafting and combining rather than eating or planting.
lore.item.deep_aether.gentle_wind_spawn_: This is a spawn egg that is used to spawn the Gentle Wind in Creative Mode.
lore.item.deep_aether.golden_grass_seeds: These seeds come from Golden Grass. Combine it with a Swet Ball to make Golden Swet Balls.
lore.item.deep_aether.golden_swet_ball: A gooey orb that is combined from Swet Balls and Golden Grass Seeds. Can be used to turn Aether Dirt into Golden Grass.
lore.item.deep_aether.goldenleaf_berries: Goldenleaf Berries come from Golden Vines that grow from Quicksoil. They restore 2 hunger bars.
lore.item.deep_aether.gravitite_ring: A powerful ring that boosts the Stratus Armor's dash and Gravitite Armor's boosted jump.
lore.item.deep_aether.green_squash_slice: Obtained from Green Squashes. Eating a slice can give levitation, jump boost, or luck.
lore.item.deep_aether.medal_of_honor: A powerful pendant dropped when defeating a Valkyrie Queen without taking a single hit. Wearing it grants you the Valkyries' Grace, that gives resistance against unholy mobs.
lore.item.deep_aether.moa_fodder: A quick feed for Moas! Can provide a Moa with a variety of effects.
lore.item.deep_aether.music_disc_a_morni: A music disc that plays A Morning Wish by Emile van Krieken.
lore.item.deep_aether.music_disc_above_t: A music disc that plays Above The Rain by Quizzly.
lore.item.deep_aether.music_disc_atta: A music disc that plays atta by Aethyus
lore.item.deep_aether.music_disc_cyclone: A music disc that plays Cyclone by Quizzly.
lore.item.deep_aether.music_disc_faent: A music disc that plays fænt by Aethyus
lore.item.deep_aether.music_disc_himinin: A music disc that plays himininn by Aethyus
lore.item.deep_aether.music_disc_nabooru: A music disc that plays Nabooru by Emile van Krieken.
lore.item.deep_aether.poison_bucket: A Bucket that has been filled with a deadly poison.
lore.item.deep_aether.purple_squash_slic: Obtained from Purple Squashes. Eating a slice can give levitation, inebriation, or resistance.
lore.item.deep_aether.quail_egg: Peculiar egg that Quails lay. They're as tasty as the originals!
lore.item.deep_aether.quail_spawn_egg: This is a spawn egg that is used to spawn the Quail in Creative Mode.
lore.item.deep_aether.raw_aerglow_fish: Obtained after killing an Aerglow Fish, the Aether's equivalent to a fish.
lore.item.deep_aether.raw_quail: Obtained after killing a Quail, the Aether's equivalent to a Chicken.
lore.item.deep_aether.roseroot_boat: While the Aether does not have many large bodies of water, a boat can occasionally be a useful tool for crossing large distances over ice!
lore.item.deep_aether.roseroot_chest_boa: A Roseroot Boat with a handy chest in the back. Helpful for transporting more items over long stretches of water, which are famously difficult to find in the Aether.
lore.item.deep_aether.skyjade: A sharp gem that can be constructed to tools even more powerful than diamond. However, it’s very fragile and shatters as the durability goes down and becomes slower.
lore.item.deep_aether.skyjade_axe: One of Aether's mid-tier tools. You can mine wood faster than diamond, but the tool mines slower as the tool is worn down.
lore.item.deep_aether.skyjade_boots: Part of the Skyjade Armor set. Has a very high protection value, but low durability and gives less protection when the durability goes down.
lore.item.deep_aether.skyjade_chestplate: Part of the Skyjade Armor set. Has a very high protection value, but low durability and gives less protection when the durability goes down.
lore.item.deep_aether.skyjade_gloves: Part of the Skyjade Armor set. Has a very high protection value, but low durability and gives less protection when the durability goes down.
lore.item.deep_aether.skyjade_helmet: Part of the Skyjade Armor set. Has a very high protection value, but low durability and gives less protection when the durability goes down.
lore.item.deep_aether.skyjade_hoe: One of Aether's mid-tier tools. You can mine faster than diamond, but the tool mines slower as the tool is worn down.
lore.item.deep_aether.skyjade_leggings: Part of the Skyjade Armor set, needed to complete the Skyjade set.
lore.item.deep_aether.skyjade_moa_armor: A piece of Skyjade Armor for your Moa to wear, offering some amount of protection.
lore.item.deep_aether.skyjade_nugget: Apparently gemstones can have nuggets. This way they can be used for additional things like Skyjade Chains. Time to make use of them!
lore.item.deep_aether.skyjade_pendant: A pendant which allows you to mine faster. It lasts for a shorter period of time than Zanite Rings, so use it wisely!
lore.item.deep_aether.skyjade_pickaxe: One of Aether's mid-tier tools, you can mine stone faster than diamond, but the tool mines slower as the tool is worn down.
lore.item.deep_aether.skyjade_ring: A ring which allows you to mine faster. It lasts for a shorter time than Zanite Rings, so use it wisely!
lore.item.deep_aether.skyjade_shield: A shield made completely of Skyjade used to block attacks. It doesn't seem to have any special quirks, but is still more durable than a wooden shield.
lore.item.deep_aether.skyjade_shovel: One of Aether's mid-tier tools. You can mine dirt and quicksoil faster than diamond, but the tool mines slower as the tool is worn down.
lore.item.deep_aether.skyjade_sword: One of Aether's mid-tier tools. The attack damage on this sword starts at Netherite level, and will get to Wood level when its durability is low.
lore.item.deep_aether.skyroot_aerglow_fi: A bucket with a Aerglow Fish in it. Make sure to keep the water topped up or your new friend won't survive the journey home.
lore.item.deep_aether.skyroot_virulent_q: A Bucket filled with the suffocating Virulent Quicksand
lore.item.deep_aether.slider_eye: A powerful part of the Slider dropped when defeating a Slider without taking a single hit. It allows you to slam into the ground when you're two block or more above the ground dealing knockback and damage to nearby enemies.
lore.item.deep_aether.spooky_ring: You deal more damage during night towards midnight, with up to a maximum of 2 extra damage.
lore.item.deep_aether.squash_seeds: Obtained from enchanting pumpkin seeds in an altar. Can be planted to grow Blue or Green Squash.
lore.item.deep_aether.storm_bow: It's a storm... in a bow!
lore.item.deep_aether.storm_sword: A weapon with a blade made of pure clouds. Deals extra knockback to enemies when attacked with a fully charged attack.
lore.item.deep_aether.stormforged_boots: A part of the Stormforged armor set. This heavy armor set negates most of incoming knockback, as well as dealing knockback to the attacker.
lore.item.deep_aether.stormforged_chestp: A part of the Stormforged armor set. This heavy armor set negates most of incoming knockback, as well as dealing knockback to the attacker.
lore.item.deep_aether.stormforged_gloves: A part of the Stormforged armor set. This heavy armor set negates most of incoming knockback, as well as dealing knockback to the attacker.
lore.item.deep_aether.stormforged_helmet: A part of the Stormforged armor set. This heavy armor set negates most of incoming knockback, as well as dealing knockback to the attacker.
lore.item.deep_aether.stormforged_leggin: A part of the Stormforged armor set. This heavy armor set negates most of incoming knockback, as well as dealing knockback to the attacker
lore.item.deep_aether.stratus_axe: An upgrade to the Gravitite Axe, this axe not only can make wood blocks float, but it can mine Golden Oak logs for Golden Amber!
lore.item.deep_aether.stratus_boots: An upgrade to the Gravitite Boots. When the full set is worn, you get an extra high jump and a dash!
lore.item.deep_aether.stratus_chestplate: An upgrade to the Gravitite Chestplate. When the full set is worn, you get an extra high jump and a dash!
lore.item.deep_aether.stratus_gloves: An upgrade to the Gravitite Gloves, needed to complete the Stratus set.
lore.item.deep_aether.stratus_helmet: An upgrade to the Gravitite Helmet. When the full set is worn, you get an extra high jump and a dash!
lore.item.deep_aether.stratus_hoe: An upgrade to the Gravitite Hoe. This hoe not only can make weirdly specific blocks float, but it can also till dirt which totally justifies its existence.
lore.item.deep_aether.stratus_ingot: Crafted from Stratus Scrap and Gravitite, giving the ingot a pink color. Can be used to upgrade Gravitite Weapons and Armors.
lore.item.deep_aether.stratus_leggings: An upgrade to the Gravitite Leggings. When the full set is worn, you get an extra high jump and a dash!
lore.item.deep_aether.stratus_pickaxe: An upgrade to the Gravitite Pickaxe. When mining with this powerful tool, you can right-click on any stone block and it will levitate into the air! You can mine any ore with this pickaxe.
lore.item.deep_aether.stratus_ring: An upgraded variant of the Gravitite Ring.
lore.item.deep_aether.stratus_scrap: Crafted from Divine Debris. Can be used to craft Stratus Ingots.
lore.item.deep_aether.stratus_shield: A shield made completely of Stratus used to block attacks. It doesn't seem to have any special quirks, but is still more durable than a wooden shield.
lore.item.deep_aether.stratus_shovel: An upgrade to the Gravitite Shovel. This shovel has the special ability to make dirt blocks or sand levitate! When combined with enchantments such as efficiency, it will instantly break Aether Dirt!
lore.item.deep_aether.stratus_smithing_t: A smithing template found in Gold Dungeons. Used to upgrade Gravitite equipment into their Stratus counterpart.
lore.item.deep_aether.stratus_sword: An upgrade to the Gravitite Sword. When attacking with this powerful weapon, anything you hit will be flung into the air, causing lots of damage!
lore.item.deep_aether.sun_core: A powerful core of the Sun Spirit dropped when defeating a Sun Spirit without taking a single hit. Maybe you can harness some of its power.
lore.item.deep_aether.sunroot_boat: While the Aether does not have many large bodies of water, a boat can occasionally be a useful tool for crossing large distances over ice!
lore.item.deep_aether.sunroot_chest_boat: A Sunroot Boat with a handy chest in the back. Helpful for transporting more items over long stretches of water, which are famously difficult to find in the Aether.
lore.item.deep_aether.venomite_spawn_egg: This is a spawn egg that is used to spawn the Venomite in Creative Mode.
lore.item.deep_aether.virulent_quicksand: A Skyroot Bucket filled with the suffocating Virulent Quicksand
lore.item.deep_aether.wind_shield: A shield made of pure air, that can entirely block one instance of damage. However be careful, since this shield is very fragile and will need a minute to recover after use.
lore.item.deep_aether.windfly_spawn_egg: This is a spawn egg that is used to spawn the Windfly in Creative Mode.
lore.item.deep_aether.yagroot_boat: While the Aether does not have many large bodies of water, a boat can occasionally be a useful tool for crossing large distances over ice!
lore.item.deep_aether.yagroot_chest_boat: A Yagroot Boat with a handy chest in the back. Helpful for transporting more items over long stretches of water, which are famously difficult to find in the Aether.
lore.item.deep_aether.squall_plate: A unique metallic plate forged somewhere in the skies. With the respective template, it can be used in a Smithing Table to forge Stormforged gear.
lore.item.deep_aether.stormforged_smithi: A smithing template that can be used for the creation of Stormforged gear, using both Squall Plates and Skyjade gear.
item.deep_aether.skyroot_virulent_quicks: This block is a great trap for those who aren't careful when wandering around in the Yagroot Forest.
lore.item.deep_aether.storm_ruler: A weapon with a blade made of pure clouds. Deals extra knockback to enemies when attacked with a fully charged attack. §oOnly a storm can fell a greatwood.
